7.title: Garfield
7.author: by Andi Watson.
notes: 1 v. : ill. ; 26 cm.
(Skeleton Key ; 5)
"Collecting issues 1-4 of the Roots mini-series."

Back cover blurb: "Times are a changin' in Garfield. Tamsin begins to consider her future plans for college. Only there's one thing standing in her way...her best friend Kitsune. How can she leave her behind when Kitty can't even shop for groceries on her own. Community college beckons, but is it really what Tamsin wants?"

notes: Summary: Garfield encounters a chained up dog, who doesn't seem threatening.

132.title: Garfield
132.author: Jim Davis.
notes: Summary: The television cook plays with the bird before getting it ready for roasting.

133.title: Garfield
133.author: Jim Davis.
133.series: Mar. 23, 1999) "Obviously We're Dealing with an Inferior Adhesive"*
notes: Summary: Odie falls from the ceiling.

134.title: Garfield
134.author: Jim Davis.
notes: Summary: Garfield supervises Jon's mowing of the lawn.

135.title: Garfield
135.author: Jim Davis.
notes: Summary: Jon asks the waitress at the diner how the chicken is, and she says it hasn't been well.
From Listín Diario (Dominican Republic), Jan. 23, 2000.

136.title: Garfield
136.author: Jim Davis.
notes: Summary: Garfield has finally met a Monday he can like.

137.title: Garfield
137.author: by Jim Davis.
notes: Summary: The phone rings just as Jon is wishing for the sound of a woman's voice.

138.title: Garfield
138.author: Jim Davis.
138.series: Oct. 7, 2000) "You Forgot to Jiggle the Handle Again"*
notes: Summary: Jon thinks he hears purring, but it's the toilet.

139.title: Garfield
139.author: by Jim Davis.
139.series: Sept. 30, 2000) "Just This Eviction Notice from the Planet Earth"*
notes: Summary: Not much for Jon in the mail today.

140.title: Garfield
140.author: by Jim Davis.
140.series: May 30, 2001) "Extra Horseradish Sauce on Your Garlic-Onion-Sardine Sandwich?"*

141.title: Garfield
141.author: Jim Davis.
141.series: June 5, 2001) "You're Blinding Me With Your Logic"*
notes: Summary: Jon says it's too nice out to mow the lawn, so he'll water it instead. Garfield puts on sunglasses.

142.title: Garfield
142.author: Jim Davis.
notes: Summary: Garfield converses with a donut.

143.title: Garfield
143.author: Jim Davis.
notes: Summary: Garfield objects to eating lettuce until presented with an alternative weight-loss suggestion.

144.title: Garfield
144.author: Jim Davis.
notes: Summary: Garfield thinks he's safe, but a costumed dog pops up under him.

145.title: Garfield
145.author: Jim Davis.
145.series: Aug. 8, 2003) "If I See One More Cat Hair Around Here, I'm Going to Lose It"*

146.title: Garfield
146.author: Jim Davis.
146.series: Apr. 12, 2004) "And Who Says Exercise is Good for Your Health?"*
notes: Summary: The dog's on a low-fat diet, so he won't bite Garfield.

147.title: Garfield
147.author: Jim Davis.
notes: Summary: It looks like Garfield has fallen through a table.

148.title: Garfield
148.author: Jim Davis.
notes: Summary: Garfield declares the house free of mice, and some cheese walks by.

149.title: Garfield
149.author: Jim Davis.
149.series: July 5, 2004) "The Screws on that Chandelier Need Tightening"*
notes: Summary: It's Monday, so the chandelier falls on Garfield.

150.title: Garfield
150.author: Jim Davis.
150.series: July 6, 2004) "It's a Giant Meatball from Outer Space!"*
notes: Summary: In his dream, Garfield saves Jon from the meatball.

151.title: Garfield
151.author: Jim Davis.
151.series: July 26, 2005) "As Soon As I Reassemble the Mower!"*
notes: Summary: Garfield offers a wrench to Jon, so he can mow the lawn.

152.title: Garfield
152.author: Jim Davis.
152.series: Aug. 25, 2005) "You Pushed Me Off My Chair!"*
notes: Summary: Garfield calls Jon a klutz.

153.title: Garfield
153.author: by Jim Davis.
153.series: Sept. 8, 2005) "How Unfortunate and How So Very Strange"*
notes: Summary: Jon announces the last bag of potato chips.

154.title: Garfield
154.author: Jim Davis.
notes: Summary: Jon enjoys talking to Ellen.

155.title: Garfield
155.author: by Jim Davis.
notes: Summary: Jon tells Ellen she'll have to beg to go out with him.

156.title: Garfield
156.author: Jim Davis.
156.series: May 27, 2006) "She Just Happened to Be Invisible"*
notes: Summary: Garfield thinks it's funny that Jon's date didn't show up.

158.title: Garfield
158.author: Jim Davis.
notes: Summary: Jon finds a scary movie in the TV Guide.

159.title: Garfield
159.author: Jim Davis.
159.series: Nov. 6, 2006) "Look at All the Dead Bugs in That Ceiling Lamp"*
notes: Summary: Jon's response to the discovery of the bugs is to go watch TV, and Garfield thinks: "We're Bachelors, Baby."

160.title: Garfield
160.author: Jim Davis.
notes: Summary: Odie hears that Jon is cooking, and runs outside to eat grass.

161.title: Garfield
161.author: Jim Davis.
161.series: Sept. 2, 2007) "I Don't Know Why We Don't Go Out More Often"*
notes: Summary: Jon slurps his cafe latte and everybody in the coffee shop stares at him.

162.title: Garfield
162.author: Jim Davis.
162.series: Apr. 1, 2011) "No, Sir, I Do Not Have an Unusually Large Head"*

163.title: Garfield
163.author: Jim Davis.
163.series: Apr. 4, 2011) "Did I Remember to Shed Today?"*

164.title: Garfield
164.author: Jim Davis.
164.series: Apr. 6, 2011) "You Forgot to Keep Moving While You Were Shedding, Didn't You?"*

166.title: Garfield
166.author: Jim Davis.
notes: Summary: Garfield comes upon a particularly engaging "beware of dog" sign.

167.title: Garfield
167.author: Jim Davis.
notes: Summary: One dog will eat homework for food, and another has a stand selling toilet water.

168.title: Garfield
168.author: Jim Davis.
168.series: Oct. 20, 2020) "Time for My Three O'Clock Teleconference Meeting"*
notes: Summary: Garfield is working from home, and it's brutal.
